snippet.title: Little Briar Rose - First Trailer
snippet.description:
The first Little Briar Rose trailer.
Little Briar Rose is a point-and-click adventure game inspired by the sleeping beauty fable, with a stained-glass art style.
We created this trailer for the Milan Games Week 2015.

Follow us:
